column4: Looking for some advice on a good IRC app and a general site to search for software for Ubuntu? <sorry noob question I know>
thanks ill give that a try, i loaded xchat from the repo, but its not real pretty :) years ago I used iirc text based but thats a pain :)

Begin with xchat. Don't make it harder when nesaccary in the beging.
